thread.section_title: MyComicShop Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MyComicShop | mycomicshop.com
thread.title: Terry Becker

author: Terry Becker
title: Terry Becker
text:
Always professional and courteous, their system of selling is consistently easy, fast and accurate. Items always arrive in excellent packaging.
Even better is their setup for entering my inventory of comics, both the ones I want to sell and ones I want to keep. Extremely straightforward and intuitive process for me to sell through their website.
Not only the best comics website but the best designed and run online website I've ever visited for shopping, selling, research, browsing, etc.
Simply the Best!
